ygData.subject: Re: A few questions on double jeopardy l
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure-- any recent patches that might have nerfed? Although one thing that I do, and I doubt anyone else does-- I stick with lower level
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure-- any recent patches that might have
nerfed?<br><br>Although one thing that I do, and I doubt anyone else
does--<br><br>I stick with lower level spells almost always. Even
if they resist, your spells don't cost as much mana
anyway and you fizzle less. It may not be the best way
but spells are designed to be costly to use when you
first get them. <br><br>Only level 24 spell I use
consistantly right now is Wolf form and my rings. I have them
in case I need them but they're too mana intensive
and fizzle more. Wolf form is worth it if you're
about to stick and camp for a long time. Improves AC,
Attack, Damage, AND gives you speed faster than SOW
provided you don't zone AND lasts 1 1/2 hours or
so.<br><br>Basically, maybe you got lucky and now the spells are being
resisted more due to regular luck. Or maybe you've been
nerfed in some way and don't know it. Final suggestion
is try another zone. Some zones have had mobs get
upgraded. Perhaps that's the issue.<br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS Sorry I'm always so long winded. Hope this helps.
<br><br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal server.
